snippet.title: Thief - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
In this gameplay trailer, get your first in-game look at Garrett's hideout, the dark alleys of the City, and your old friend Basso. See all the pillars of Thief gameplay in action - Infiltration, Theft and Escape - as Garrett enters the Baron's manor, grabs the shinies and leaves without a trace.

The challenge is everything.

Thief will be released in February 2014 for PC, PS3 and PS4, Xbox 360 and Xbox One. 

To hear more about Thief, follow us here:
Official Site: http://thiefgame.com/
Facebook:   http://www.facebook.com/Thief
Twitter:        http://twitter.com/thief
Tumblr:        http://thiefgame.tumblr.com/
